DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Biomarkers Tumor Tissue Samples From Young Patients With Neuroblastoma
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Determine whether ubiquitin carboxyl-terminal hydrolase 1 ( UCHL1 ) expression indirect cancer stem cell marker pediatric patient neuroblastoma . Correlate UCHL1 expression stag information patient 's outcome . Study Subtype : Observational Observational Study Model : Case-control Time Perspective : Retrospective Biospecimen Retention : None Retained Biospecimen Description : Tissue Study Population Description : Tissue microarray sample patient Neuroblastoma supply COG Biopathology Center Sampling Method : Probability OUTLINE : Archived tissue microarray sample analyze ubiquitin carboxyl-terminal hydrolase 1 ( UCHL1 ) expression UCHL1 monoclonal antibody peroxidase technique . Results compare patient ' clinical data , include age diagnosis , race , date diagnosis , histology , stage location diagnosis , presence cancer predisposition , date completion treatment , surgery perform , type chemotherapy receive , history recurrence , status ( alive disease , alive without disease , dead ) , available .
